parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the [[serverCommand]] can be performed on the machine and in this exact environment, otherwise [[false]]. serverCommand can be executed only from [[User Interface Event Handlers]], and this command also checks if that's the case.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[serverCommandExecutable]] command

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  command: [[String]] - see [[Multiplayer_Server_Commands#Commands|Multiplayer Server Commands]] for all available commands

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_canKick = [[serverCommandAvailable]] "#kick";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> Add button to the main map to lock server, which could only be activated by admin:
<code>[[with]] [[uiNamespace]] [[do]] {
	ctrl = [[findDisplay]] 12 [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscButton", -1];
	ctrl [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,0.5,0.1];
	ctrl [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
	ctrl [[ctrlSetText]] "LOCK SERVER";
	ctrl [[ctrlAddEventHandler]] ["ButtonDown",
	{	
		[[if]] ([[serverCommandExecutable]] "#lock") [[then]] {
			[[serverCommand]] "#lock";
		} [[else]] {
			[[hint]] "You need to be logged in as admin to do this";
		};
	}];
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[serverCommand]], [[serverCommandAvailable]], [[Multiplayer Server Commands]]
</value></part></template>


[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>New Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
